content:
For my project, I am to model and determine whether Cryptocurrency: Bitcoin and Ethereum have better hedging and safe haven properties compared to traditional commodities: Gold and Silver against the S&P500 index, from the period may2018-2020

Give me the steps and provide brief explanations to develop an econometrics model and equations to prove the causal relationships, cointegration, and volatility; incorporating the concepts and models previously discussed. What are the data sets I need? What are the steps to compare OLS results to cointegration results and GARCH results?
